attributes.action: reduce University fees to fall into line with the ratio of Tutor teaching time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the PM to reduce tuition fees, i, along with thousands, am paying £1200/year for just seven hours of tutor teaching per week and around 31weeks off in each year! We could do most Degree courses in under a year, yet all students are getting into debt to attend university for 3 years! This is a ridiculous amount of money for hardly any teaching, no work to do most of the time and up to 5months off throughout the summer.I personally have from end of May to beginning of October off University.
